2: 접쳐서 파는 피륙의 길이를 나타내는 단위. 한 끗은 피륙을 한 번 접은 만큼의 길이이다.
화투나 투전과 같은 노름 따위에서, 셈을 치는 점수를 나타내는 단위.

0: A bound noun used to indicate the length of a fabric that is sold in folds.
A bound noun that serves as a unit for counting the points scored when gambling with hwatu or tujeon, a traditional Korean card.

2: A bound noun that serves as a unit for counting the number of bunches of long, thin objects.
A bound noun that serves as a unit for counting the number of bunches of written matarials addressing a single common topic.
